SEARCH
Package ca.mcgill.ecse321.gameorganizer.services

Class LendingRecordService

java.lang.Object
ca.mcgill.ecse321.gameorganizer.services.LendingRecordService
@Service public class LendingRecordService extends Object
Service class that handles business logic for lending record operations. Provides methods for creating, updating, and managing lending records.

      @Transactional public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createLendingRecord(Date startDate, Date endDate, BorrowRequest request, GameOwner owner)
      Creates a new lending record for a game loan.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date of the lending period
      endDate - the end date of the lending period
      request - the associated borrow request
      owner - the game owner
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with success message
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are invalid
      IllegalStateException - if creation fails
